column1: The Purple Pig////I went here just for dessert because I keep hearing how amazing the Sicilian Iris is. Well it Lived up to its expectations! It's like a  warm cannoli! I love it and will be bbrinfing my family back to try it.   However
column2: this place is just soooo loud. The music is blasting. And everyone's conversations echo about with the high ceilings.  Not a pleasant place to spend any significant amount of time.  I was happy to be out of there.  Maybe next time I'll order dessert to go
